name: validate-range
description: Validate that a numeric value falls within a specified range

input.description: Object containing a numeric field to validate

path.description: Dot-separated path to the numeric field to validate (e.g., 'user.age')

min.description: Minimum value (inclusive by default). Omit for unbounded lower range

max.description: Maximum value (inclusive by default). Omit for unbounded upper range

exclusive.description: 'true' for exclusive bounds (< and >), 'false' for inclusive (≤ and ≥). Default: 'false'

output.description: true if value is within range or path doesn't exist, false if out of range or not a number

examples.description: Validate score is exactly at boundary (inclusive)
